name: josi-memory
description: This is where you organize and manage all of your robot's short and long-term memory. Whatever storage and backup plans you have for Hubot are managed here, as are any memory Models, for more complex applications.
author: Jolly Science
readme:
### josi-memory

[coming soon]

	npm install josi-memory

This is where you organize and manage all of your robot's short and long-term memory. Whatever storage and backup plans you have for JoSi are managed here, as are any memory Models, for more complex applications.

	- josi-memory/
		- scripts/
			-
